DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the importance of exhaled nitric oxide measurements in subjects with asthma age 65 and older. This group of patients has been ignored in most previous asthma studies.
DOC.brief_title: Asthma in the Elderly: The Role of Exhaled Nitric Oxide Measurements
DOC.criteria: Subjects with asthma over the age of 65 followed in our practice, nonsmokers and able to give informed consent to participate in the study Smokers, subjects of diminished mental capacity
DOC.keyword: Asthma in subjects over the age of 65
